speaker: TALBOT
text:
Where
               
              is
               
              my
               
              strength
              ,
               
              my
               
              valor
              ,
               
              and
               
              my
               
              force
              ?

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Our
               
              English
               
              troops
               
              retire
              ;
               
              I
               
              cannot
               
              stay
               
              them
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
A
               
              woman
               
              clad
               
              in
               
              armor
               
              chaseth
               
              them
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Here
              ,
               
              here
               
              she
               
              comes
              !
              —
              I’ll
               
              have
               
              a
               
              bout
               
              with
               
              thee
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Devil
               
              or
               
              devil’s
               
              dam
              ,
               
              I’ll
               
              conjure
               
              thee
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Blood
               
              will
               
              I
               
              draw
               
              on
               
              thee
              —
              thou
               
              art
               
              a
               
              witch
              —

speaker: TALBOT
text:
And
               
              straightway
               
              give
               
              thy
               
              soul
               
              to
               
              him
               
              thou
               
              serv’st
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Come
              ,
               
              come
              ;
               
              ’tis
               
              only
               
              I
               
              that
               
              must
               
              disgrace
               
              thee
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Heavens
              ,
               
              can
               
              you
               
              suffer
               
              hell
               
              so
               
              to
               
              prevail
              ?

speaker: TALBOT
text:
My
               
              breast
               
              I’ll
               
              burst
               
              with
               
              straining
               
              of
               
              my
               
              courage
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
And
               
              from
               
              my
               
              shoulders
               
              crack
               
              my
               
              arms
               
              asunder
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
But
               
              I
               
              will
               
              chastise
               
              this
               
              high-minded
               
              strumpet
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Talbot
              ,
               
              farewell
              .
               
              Thy
               
              hour
               
              is
               
              not
               
              yet
               
              come
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
I
               
              must
               
              go
               
              victual
               
              Orleance
               
              forthwith
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
O’ertake
               
              me
               
              if
               
              thou
               
              canst
              .
               
              I
               
              scorn
               
              thy
               
              strength
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Go
              ,
               
              go
              ,
               
              cheer
               
              up
               
              thy
               
              hunger-starvèd
               
              men
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Help
               
              Salisbury
               
              to
               
              make
               
              his
               
              testament
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
This
               
              day
               
              is
               
              ours
              ,
               
              as
               
              many
               
              more
               
              shall
               
              be
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
My
               
              thoughts
               
              are
               
              whirlèd
               
              like
               
              a
               
              potter’s
               
              wheel
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
I
               
              know
               
              not
               
              where
               
              I
               
              am
               
              nor
               
              what
               
              I
               
              do
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
A
               
              witch
               
              by
               
              fear
              —
              not
               
              force
              ,
               
              like
               
              Hannibal
              —

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Drives
               
              back
               
              our
               
              troops
              ,
               
              and
               
              conquers
               
              as
               
              she
               
              lists
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
So
               
              bees
               
              with
               
              smoke
               
              and
               
              doves
               
              with
               
              noisome
               
              stench

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Are
               
              from
               
              their
               
              hives
               
              and
               
              houses
               
              driven
               
              away
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
They
               
              called
               
              us
              ,
               
              for
               
              our
               
              fierceness
              ,
               
              English
               
              dogs
              ;

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Now
               
              like
               
              to
               
              whelps
               
              we
               
              crying
               
              run
               
              away
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Hark
              ,
               
              countrymen
              ,
               
              either
               
              renew
               
              the
               
              fight
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Or
               
              tear
               
              the
               
              lions
               
              out
               
              of
               
              England’s
               
              coat
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Renounce
               
              your
               
              soil
              ;
               
              give
               
              sheep
               
              in
               
              lions’
               
              stead
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Sheep
               
              run
               
              not
               
              half
               
              so
               
              treacherous
               
              from
               
              the
               
              wolf
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Or
               
              horse
               
              or
               
              oxen
               
              from
               
              the
               
              leopard
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
As
               
              you
               
              fly
               
              from
               
              your
               
              oft-subduèd
               
              slaves
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
It
               
              will
               
              not
               
              be
              !
               
              Retire
               
              into
               
              your
               
              trenches
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
You
               
              all
               
              consented
               
              unto
               
              Salisbury’s
               
              death
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
For
               
              none
               
              would
               
              strike
               
              a
               
              stroke
               
              in
               
              his
               
              revenge
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Pucelle
               
              is
               
              entered
               
              into
               
              Orleance

speaker: TALBOT
text:
In
               
              spite
               
              of
               
              us
               
              or
               
              aught
               
              that
               
              we
               
              could
               
              do
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
O
              ,
               
              would
               
              I
               
              were
               
              to
               
              die
               
              with
               
              Salisbury
              !

speaker: TALBOT
text:
The
               
              shame
               
              hereof
               
              will
               
              make
               
              me
               
              hide
               
              my
               
              head
              .
